task: Sync data from AnkiWeb to AnkiDroid
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the data from AnkiWeb is successfully synced to AnkiDroid.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "Sync from AnkiWeb"
By touching the "Sync from AnkiWeb" button, the user is taken to the login screen where they can enter their AnkiWeb account details to sync their data. (page changed from Introduction to Login)
Fill a textfield that has text "Email address" with "2797195863@qq.com"

The textfield with the placeholder "Email address" has been focused and filled with the email address "2797195863@qq.com". A new button with the content description "Clear text" has appeared on the screen.
Fill a password textfield that has text "Password" with "20080808"
The password textfield on the login screen has been successfully filled with the new password "20080808", replacing the previous placeholder text "Password".
Touch on a button that has text "Log in"

After touching the "Log in" button, the screen has transitioned from the Login page to the DeckPicker page, where a message about the outdated system WebView is displayed along with an option to "Learn More." (page changed from Login to DeckPicker)
